content:
Can we bring up and move on these issues:

  1. default view of profiles tab (/move or remove summary)
  2. differential view terminology and invarient tables

If we have not already landed on them, I think they are the most important look and feel issues to change by next release.

Then we can run through the change process and see how it gos
I'm hoping to make those changes in late Sept. or early Oct. (unlikely to have bandwidth before then). But yes, happy for us to do the approval step.
I volunteer to make the default tab changes - whatever we decide.
Yeah, that bit is simpler. We can talk next week.
